name: 2B N1 A - 29 Shoreditch Heights
description: Modern two-bedroom apartment in the heart of vibrant Shoreditch. This stylish property features contemporary design, high-speed WiFi, and is perfectly located near trendy restaurants, bars, and galleries. Just minutes from Old Street station with excellent transport links.

name: Studio E2 - Canary Wharf Tower
description: Stunning studio apartment with breathtaking views of the Thames and Canary Wharf skyline. This modern space features floor-to-ceiling windows, premium finishes, and access to building amenities including a gym. Perfect for business travelers and couples.

name: 1B SW1 - Westminster Gardens
description: Elegant one-bedroom apartment in prestigious Westminster, moments from Big Ben and the Houses of Parliament. This beautifully appointed property combines historic charm with modern comfort. Ideal location for exploring London's most iconic landmarks.

name: 3B W1 - Mayfair Residence
description: Luxurious three-bedroom apartment in exclusive Mayfair. This exceptional property offers spacious living areas, designer furnishings, and impeccable attention to detail. Located on a quiet street yet steps from world-class shopping, dining, and entertainment.
